org.daisy.pipeline.client.http

Interface WSInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    WS

    public interface WSInterface
    Methods for communicating with the Pipeline 2 API.
    See Also:
    http://code.google.com/p/daisy-pipeline/wiki/WebServiceAPI

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • setEndpoint

        void setEndpoint(String endpoint)
        Set which Pipeline 2 Web API endpoint to use. For instance: "http://localhost:8181/ws"
        Parameters:
        endpoint - the endpoint to use

      • getEndpoint

        String getEndpoint()
        Return which Pipeline 2 Web API endpoint is currently used
        Returns:
        the endpoint used

      • setCredentials

        void setCredentials(String username,
                    String secret)
        Set the credentials to use for the Pipeline 2 Web API
        Parameters:
        username - the username to use
        secret - the secret to use

      • getUsername

        String getUsername()
        Get the username used to authenticate with the Pipeline 2 Web API
        Returns:
        the username

      • setShutDownKey

        void setShutDownKey(String key)
        Set the key used when invoking /admin/halt to shut down the engine
        Parameters:
        key - the shutdown key to use

      • getShutDownKey

        String getShutDownKey()
        Get the key meant to be used when invoking /admin/halt
        Returns:
        the shutdown key in use
